goal.ch: 修完本課程，學生應能1. 在課堂討論及上台報告中，針對不同的議題，清晰流利地表達自己的意見及想法；2. 積極引導及參與課堂討論；3. 對自己及同儕的口語表現，提供有效的評量及中肯的建議；4. 具備批判思考能力，能對自己的想法與信念做細緻的分析與評判，亦能對他 人的概念進行理性、客觀的判斷，促進人我的理解與認同。
goal.en: On successful completion of this course, students will be able to express their opinions on specific topics clearly and fluently in class discussions and oral presentations.- lead and participate in group discussions. - provide self and peer feedback for in-class performance. - improve their fluency and accuracy of spoken English.- engage in reflective and independent thinking as well as reflect on one‘s own beliefs and values.

outline.ch: 本課程透過影片及文本中多元主題的探索和討論，訓練學生進階聽力及口語溝通表達之能力，更希望引導學生對不同人文議題的思維及省思，融合個人觀點及他人角度，增進自我及人我的和諧。課程活動包括影片賞析、深度閱讀、主題論談、一分鐘演說、分組報告及課後在臉書上的心情隨記及議題探討。
outline.en: This class aims to enable students to formulate in-depth thoughts and viewpoints through the discussion of particular subject matters. In this course, students will explore a variety of topics covering intrapersonal relationships and interpersonal relationships. Each topic is introduced by the screening of a chosen film and followed by discussions based on the film and extended readings. Students are required to actively participate in class activities and to pose thoughtful questions and contribute critical exchanges through FB.
